testsuite.name: FileServerTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent. The response says that the file was created! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 2 Enter filename: > test_purpose_VLL6W1G.txt Enter file content: > GUOD3FT55FRZWX4Y8M The request was sent. The response says that creating the file was forbidden! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_VLL6W1G.txt The request was sent. The content of the file is: GUOD3FT55FRZWX4Y8M Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_OHDC8YU0J.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was not found! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_9CZGMHIFE.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was not found! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_VLL6W1G.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was successfully deleted! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent.
